programme.title: Arches & Canyonlands Ambient Nature Film
programme.desc: The sublime landscape of Arches and Canyonlands area of Utah is the star in this 90 minute film, which showcases awe-inspiring natural arches, dramatic canyon vista sunrises & sunsets, and flights through arches and over the Colorado River canyon. The spectacular cinematography is accompanied by beautiful Native American flute music. Note: All Drone footage was filmed outside of National and State Park boundaries.

programme.title: Preview for Journey Through Glacier National Park
programme.desc: Embark on a breathtaking "Journey Through Glacier National Park" in our newest release. Enjoy a serene visual escape into one of America’s most stunning National Parks. This immersive nature film captures the park’s majestic snowy mountains, shimmering glacial lakes, and crystal-clear rivers in stunning detail. Encounter native wildlife in their natural habitats and wander through alpine meadows blooming with vibrant wildflowers. Let the sights and sounds of Glacier National Park renew your spirit and connect you to the wild beauty of the natural world. The full 90 minute film is available to subscribers of NatureStream.tv.

programme.title: Alaska
programme.desc: Journey into the beautiful wilderness of Alaska through the photography of Olof & Elizabeth Carmel. This art display film showcases their most stunning photographs of Americas last great wilderness - from breaching whales and misty mountains of the Inside Passage to the Grizzlies and soaring peaks of Denali National Park. This 60 minute film will give you new appreciation for the wilderness of the wild North. Accompanied by a beautiful acoustic guitar soundtrack.

programme.title: Winter Wonder, Sierra Mountains
programme.desc: Experience the exhilarating vistas of winter in the spectacular Sierra Nevada Mountains. This 2 hour Ambient Nature Film will transform your screen into a wondrous display of natural beauty that inspires the spirit and soothes the soul. Available in 4k. Watch the full film free on Naturestream.tvs free Apple TV App, Fire TV App, or WebApp. Available for subscribers in the Roku App under Ambient Nature Films. iOS & Android Apps are also available!

programme.title: Rihanna vs. Chris Brown.
programme.desc: S1:E1 Rihanna found herself the victim of assault, from her best friend and then-boyfriend, Chris Brown. Not only was she humiliated in front of the world, but she also faced further attacks from the media, some going as far as claiming the violence was her fault. We uncovered the real story of Rihanna’s experience during and after the incident, not the one portrayed by the media, where she shows us why she is the strong, compassionate, graceful woman the world fell in love within the first place.

programme.title: Gwen Stefani vs. Gavin Rossdale
programme.desc: S1:E3 When Gwen Stefani’s happy 20-year relationship with Gavin Rossdale came crashing down, and she started dating Blake Shelton right after the divorce, the media went crazy. Discover the real story of the months of media torture Gwen had to go through, and where she is now in her new relationship with her new man.

programme.title: Britney Spears vs. Justin Timberlake
programme.desc: S1:E8 Did Britney Spears really cheat on Justin Timberlake? Britney and Justin were the perfect couple until she was accused of cheating on him after their breakup. Justin told the world his side of the story and the media believed him while Britney was mocked and silenced. The whole world watched as Britney went from being the media’s pop princess to spiralling in a very public meltdown, but what did Justin have to do with it? Our team uncovered the truth behind what really happened, and what Justin’s iconic Cry Me a River video has to do with Britney’s freedom.

programme.title: Amber Rose vs. Kanye West
programme.desc: S1:E5 it true that Kanye West was harassing Amber Rose when she suddenly left him? When Kanye West started dating Amber Rose, he took her from the life of being a stripper to the global superstar world. At first, they seemed like a couple that was truly in love. But when Amber suddenly left Kanye, his attitude towards her completely changed. Our team uncovered the real story behind the tabloids of the years of bullying, unwanted media attention, and attacks that Amber had to suffer. The true story will reveal why she was the special woman Kanye fell in love with in the first place, and what she and Kim Kardashian have in common.

programme.title: The Rise of Charity Witt
programme.desc: S1:E5 Dubbed The Worlds Strongest Barbie, Charity suffered a heart attack when she was only 17 years old, due to being overworked and poor life choices. This health crisis lead her to change her mindset by taking action on changing her life, that put her on a path that lead her to becoming an elite powerlifter, a Strongwoman competitor, a winner of the Titan Games and escaping an abusive relationship.

programme.title: The Rise Of Fredia Gibbs
programme.desc: S1:E6 Fredia Gibbs was the first female African American kickboxing world champion who learned how to fight as a child because she grew up scared and afraid. It wasn’t until she unknowingly got into a van alone after a party with a man who turned out to be a serial killer, that all the years of fighting and training would help her unleash the power she had inside of her and catapult her to new heights.

programme.title: The Rise Of Damien Rider
programme.desc: S1:E7 Damien Rider was beaten up, thrown against walls, and left all by himself as a child because of an abusive stepfather. After four attempts to end his own life, he decided he needed to deal with his demons by doing the most extreme thing he could do. Discover why Damien felt like he needed to paddle through a deadly ocean and why when he was just about to quit, the entire trajectory of his life would be permanently changed forever.

programme.title: The Rise of Rocky NoHands
programme.desc: S1:E4 How would you feel if you lost in Fortnite to one of the worlds best players, and found out he was using his mouth as a controller? RockyNoHands is a professional eSports Fortnite player, making a career of playing a video game he loves and being among the best in the world at it. After the darkest moment of Rocky’s life left him paralyzed and motionless in a hospital bed, doctors told him he may never walk again. It wasn’t until a source of pure motivation forced him to dig deep to find his unbreakable drive, that he was able to take on his biggest and most rewarding challenge yet.

programme.title: Deontay Wilder - Box For Life
programme.desc: American heavyweight champion Deontay Wilder reveals the heartbreaking reason why he got into boxing and the one person who inspired him to never give up fighting to become the World Champion.

programme.title: Lopez Lomong The Olympian Lost Boy
programme.desc: He went from running for his life to running to represent his country, seeing the worst human cruelties to life’s biggest blessings, and enduring years of hopelessness to experiencing the most fulfilling accomplishments. Lopez Lomong’s story proves what we can achieve if we make the most of the opportunities life gives us.

programme.title: The Dark Side of Elon Musk
programme.desc: Elon Musk, founder of SpaceX and CEO of Tesla, always found it hard fitting in with others. Hiding his painful secrets - Elon threw himself into his work, amassing huge success as an entrepreneur. But when he got caught up in the middle of a messy divorce with Amber Heard, Elon’s worst fears were realized and he hit a severe breaking point.

programme.title: Alicia Kozakiewicz Friend or Predator
programme.desc: At just 13 years old, Alicia Kozakiewicz stepped outside her family home and into every parent’s worst nightmare. She’d agreed to meet the “friend” with whom she’d been chatting online for six months, but by the time she realized this man was a deranged predator, it was too late. How did she manage to stay alive? And what traumatic lesson does Alicia want all parents and teens to hear?

programme.title: Terry Crews My Biggest Regret
programme.desc: For years Terry Crews was terrified of his alcoholic father. Decades later, Terry finally confronts him about his childhood. But why does it become his biggest regret?

programme.title: Gloria Allred The Fight For Change
programme.desc: One of the most loved and controversial lawyers in the world, Gloria Allred is responsible for putting Harvey Weinstein behind bars… and now, she’s going after Prince Andrew and Ghislaine Maxwell. Why does she get involved in these high profile cases and why is it all so personal for her?

programme.title: The Most Banned Author in America
programme.desc: Maya Angelou’s traumatic childhood changed the trajectory of her life. She lived in silence for many years, afraid for her safety and the safety of her loved ones. America couldn’t handle her truth when she finally shared what happened, and was quick to ban her story but it caught like wildfire. This story changed the world and yours can, too. Enjoy this new inspirational documentary!

programme.title: Saroo Brierley Journey Back Home
programme.desc: 5-year-old Saroo Brierley woke up on a train heading 2,000km away from his home in India & thought he’d never see his family again. Accidentally orphaned, an Australian family adopted him but Saroo couldn’t let go of the thought that his family mighty still be alive. 25 years later, he embarked on a quest to find the truth and what happens next is truly unbelievable.

programme.title: Vengeance For A Voiceless Child
programme.desc: 8 year old Jennifer wakes up in the middle of the night in the arms of a police officer. The man wants her to believe that she is safe, but she realizes he doesnt have a badge as he drives off to a remote area. Later that night, her kidnapper leaves her for dead in the middle of a field after brutally attacking her, and from that moment on, Jennifer vows to remember every single detail about him in order to make sure he’s caught. Her injuries leave her unable to talk, yet she still finds a way to catch him… 19 years later.

programme.title: Saschiz Old Town, Romania
programme.desc: Saschiz, village, and commune, Mureș județ county is located in central Romania. The villages of Saschiz, Mihai Viteazu, and Cloașterf make up the larger commune of Saschiz. Located in the old region of Transylvania, it lies about 20 km east of Sighișoara"&". First documented in the 14th century, Saschiz is known for its medieval fortress and church constructed by Transylvanian Saxons, a German speaker. They settled in Transylvania when it was part of Hungary. The ruins of the 14th-century fortress sit atop "&"a hill overlooking the village. The late 15th-century fortified church has Gothic details and an imposing clock tower. Along with five other villages with fortified churches, Saschiz was inscribed on UNESCO’s World Heritage sites in 1999.

programme.desc:
Join EDEN as they step on stage with a simple message. With EDEN waste will power the future.
EDEN systems convert mixed carbon based waste into: • clean electricity • clean fuels • bio and hydrochar for soil • recoverable grey water
Waste is no longer a liability, it is now an asset. The solution to pollution is here and EDEN will be restored.

programme.title: Bitcoin Jesus: The Prosecution of Roger Ver
programme.desc: They call him “Bitcoin Jesus,” though he despises the nickname. His real name is Roger Ver. At any moment, Roger could be arrested for alleged tax evasion and mail fraud. But anyone familiar with his case knows the truth: Roger’s only “crime” was being the very first investor and passionate advocate for Bitcoin. For that, he faces 109 years in federal prison. As devastating as this is for Roger, this case is less about him and more about you.

No gas fees, no headaches, just fast and simple memecoin creation and trading that could change the game for all memecoins. From the Internet Computer to Bitcoin, Toniq Labs has been pushing boundaries in decentralization and on-chain innovation. If you want to see the future of digital assets, this is the episode.

programme.title: The 900 Series
programme.desc: Brant replaces rear spoiler cam struts on a 2001 996 turbo; Auotmotive journalist Doug Neilson shows off his newly restored Ruf and has Blake diagnose the air conditioning system

programme.title: Bike World
programme.desc: Bridgestone took Chris to Portugal to ride their latest Adventure Tires, so which one is right for you and your bike? Chris spent a couple of weeks with the MV Agusta Superveloce 800, and he even managed to get it on track.

programme.title: Sams Garage
programme.desc: Sam and Doug work on his 2001 Saleen Cobra

programme.title: RaceMAX Motorsports
programme.desc: Round 2 of the Porsche Carrera Cup and highlights from the first 5 rounds of the Eco Rally Cup.

programme.title: Seasonal Upcycle
programme.desc: Create your own upcycle wardrobe. The show opens with Angela Wolf and adding the finishing details to the trench coat: top stitching and hem. Then it’s time to upcycle ties with your T’s for a brand-new look with Londa Rohlfing. Honor memories and recycle too.

programme.title: Off Our Needles
programme.desc: Hold onto your needles! Tracie and Jodi, are here to dish out fresh fiber inspiration. From project picks to wooly good gossip, things are about to get super knitty… and maybe just a little nutty.

programme.title: Artist
programme.desc: Artists look at the world from fresh perspectives. Host Jenny Barnett-Rohrs draws the geometric patterns she sees looking at the world from high above. Franz Spohn has ideas for all the things artists can do besides creating works for a museum. Candie Cooper introduces us to the art form of Yamamoto to create a collage and Candie makes a 3-D color wheel.

programme.title: Playtime
programme.desc: Every day is play time! Challenge your skills with an ice cream cone ball toss game. Design your own indoor miniature golf course with Franz, then put on a show with puppets Jenny shows how to make and decorate. Add some cardboard to the Family Craft Box to create a super mask and make your own superhero figure.

programme.title: Ice Castles
programme.desc: Developing your sense of place also includes those imaginary locations you see only in your mind. In this episode we explore ice castles, or more accurately, cold and ice, conjuring up clean lines, colors of white, silver and blue, and sunlight shimmering on snow or ice. Lindsay Burke begins with an architecture inspired necklace highlighted by crystals. Then it's 3 quick projects with Leslie Rogalski featuring crystals and tools. Finally, Tammy Honaman makes chain with loops and crystals.

programme.title: Natural Basics
programme.desc: In the hands of an artist – even the simplest materials take on a new life. We begin with stone cabochons. Then artist Ashley Bunting uses jump rings and crimp tubes to make a simple chainmaille style chain with the most basic of materials. Then Katie creates a prayer mantra bracelet inspired by ancient art. Finally, learn the basics of fine silver metal clay and torch firing with artist Tammy Honaman and complete a necklace using just a pendant and simple leather cording.

programme.title: Paint Your Way
programme.desc: Raid your art box for paint and gesso as we paint our way to fantastic layouts. Create Stencils with Jenny Barnett Rohrs, a layout from Ronda Palazzari with a technique for changing patterned paper into unique embellishments with gesso, and watercolors, and the fourth level (that's more than the third!) of dimension from Kim Hupke on a page entitled "my girl".

programme.title: Episode 5: Your Home
programme.desc: You may be spending a little more time at home lately. Shape up your rooms with some new looks. First, host Julie Fei Fan Balzer creates quilt block pillow covers -- change them up for an instant update. Then, it's movie night with Lynn Lilly from her home studio -- make a personalized party right at home. Last is a color study -- the color blue.

programme.title: The Midnight Quilt Show
programme.desc: Say hello to The Midnight Quilt Show, a series that celebrates late-night stitches, taking shortcuts and sewing in your PJs! Each week, host Angela Walters will bring you a quick and quippy breakdown of a brand new quilt… wine not included.

programme.title: Felix The Ghost Breaker (1923)
programme.desc: Felix is trying to get some sleep in a graveyard, but keeps getting bothered by a ghost. He follows the ghost to the house of an old farmer, and the ghost proceeds to terrorize the old man, and when the farmer calls for help from the police, the ghost terrorizes them, too. Felix, however, suspects something fishy is going on, and with the help of the farmer's donkey, gets to the bottom of things.

programme.desc: The first human mission to another solar system loses 2 crew on a red dust-covered planet, which once had an advanced civilization. programme.title: MUSE, THE
programme.desc: Rock star Addison Taylor is three years removed from the fame and fortune of being a one hit wonder and his life is spiraling into a self center paranoid depression - He needs another hit and fast. His manager suggests a couple weeks away at a secluded recently purchased lake-house as a way to get the creative juices flowing. The change in scenery sparks immediate inspiration, but also a strange and potentially deadly change in Addison. A mysterious force in the form of a beautiful woman and an odd, eerily marked guitar helps him to create his best work but also appears to want something in return. Things turn deadly when friends intervene in an attempt to bring Addison back to reality - will he pull free of the Muses clutches or will Addison fall prey to her powers and stay forever?

programme.title: JACKIN & JOYRIDIN
programme.desc: Jigga Jones is famous on the internet for showing off high tech crime and how to get away with it. This is the collection of videos that he never intended the public to see. Fueled by alcohol and profanity this video gives you a behind the scenes ride-a-long with the criminal underworld.

programme.title: LOUISE'S DIARY 1942
programme.desc: Based on a true story, Louises Diary 1942 is a dramatic tale of forbidden love in a time of war. Told through the eyes of an older man reading a diary from the German Occupation of France in 1942, Louises Diary 1942 is the story of Louise, a young Jewish woman who had her identity changed with the help of Hans, a young SS Officer who rejects the Nazi ideology. The two lovers remain at Huguettes, a young Cabaret singer. But they cant escape the animosity of war forever.

programme.title: BELL RUNG
programme.desc: A compelling documentary on the effect of concussions on football players and their families. From sleeplessness to suicide, it reveals a complex portrait of life after the gridiron.

programme.title: ""I envied for not doing Nandhini's character in Ponniyin Selvan" - Meena | Vijay"
programme.desc: In this exclusive interview, the legendary South Indian actress Meena shares her inspiring journey. She talks about her early struggles, memorable roles, and challenges as a woman in the film industry.

programme.title: Deivamagal Episode 7
programme.desc: Deivamagal is an Indian Tamil-language soap opera starring Vani Bhojan and Krishna. It was broadcast on Sun TV initially from Monday to Friday and later extended to Saturday at 8 PM from 25 March 2013 to 17 February 2018 for 1,466 episodes. The show replaced S. Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. This serial was shot in Pollachi, Chennai, Chengalpet, Hyderabad, Kerala, Puducherry, and Cuddalore. This is the first TV serial shot in the Bay of Bengal Plot Prakash his wife Sathyapriya and his eldest sister-in-law Gayathris conspiracies against their families to conquer Prakshs ancestral property Jai Hind Vilas.

programme.title: Ananda Vikatan Cinema Awards 2016
programme.desc: Ananda Vikatan Cinema Awards is an annual awards ceremony for people in the Tamil film industry. It is presented by the Tamil language weekly magazine Ananda Vikatan. The awards were introduced in the year 2008, honouring the films that were released in 2007.

programme.title: Wedding Dress Trends: Wedding Gowns for Bride
programme.desc: Unique-styled wedding gowns are becoming famous among brides. They include ball gowns, a-line gowns, and mermaid gowns. Shiny Ashwin, the stylist, shows us how to dress up.

programme.title: """Answer this, you fools!"" | Mansoor Ali Khan Interview"
programme.desc: Mansoor Ali Khan is an Indian actor, music composer, writer and producer. who has predominantly appeared in Tamil films, mostly in antagonistic and supporting roles. He got a breakthrough role as an antagonist in Captain Prabhakaran. After the success of this film, he got a lot of acting opportunities.

programme.title: """People won't believe that this is my composition!"" - Godson Rudolph | Anirudh"
programme.desc: In this episode, Godson Rudolph, Indias first visually-challenged music director, shares his interest in music. programme.title: Interview with SaReGaMaPa Title Winner Purushothaman
programme.desc: Welcome to Tele Vikatan, your one-stop destination for everything television! Get ready to immerse yourself in the captivating world of TV shows, exclusive interviews, soap opera reviews, and more. Our dedicated team is here to bring you the latest updates and behind-the-scenes insights from the exciting realm of television. Discover the thrill of your favorite television dramas as we delve into their gripping storylines and unforgettable characters. Join us as we go beyond the screen to explore the lives of your beloved TV stars through exclusive interviews, where they share their experiences, anecdotes, and behind-the-scenes stories. At Tele Vikatan, we are passionate about delivering high-quality content that caters to the diverse tastes and interests of our viewers. Whether youre a fan of heartwarming family dramas, thrilling mysteries, or gripping romance, we have something for everyone. We provide you with informative and entertaining videos that enhance your TV viewing experience. With Tele Vikatan, youll never miss a moment of the television magic.

programme.title: Meep Meep Charlies
programme.desc: Boris and Sandy are fighting over the water sprayer and drenching Uncle Charlie with it. This leaves Charlie with no choice but to call on Deedee’s magic. Deedee finds a spell to make friendship dust as the perfect solution. Whoever the dust falls on will be best friends with whoever they see first. Happy for getting the magic powder they all set off to see Boris and Sandy. But on the way the Doobydoos rush at them so suddenly that they fall all over them and the Doobydoos become friends of Charlie and carry him off. Nino tries to explain the situation to Deedee, but she is too busy to listen. Back over at Charlie’s, the Doobydoos are treating him as a king and tries to run away from his new friends. Deedee finds some of the missing magic powder but tries to find Charlie. Deedee tries to bring things back to normal with magic, but Nino is against it. They find a way to get the twins to work together and splash the Doobydoos with water and wash off the friendship dust. The twins are friends again even though Deedee’s magic didn’t work as expected.

programme.title: Gummys Sick Day
programme.desc: Gummy is feeling under the weather – and, as a finicky, fussbudget patient, soon winds up driving his pals Kala and Harry both sick... of him!

programme.title: YesYouCan
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: KUSHTI ME MASTI
programme.desc: It is a regular morning in hotel Kelifornia until the much feared wrestler comes in for food. Sundar is all set to please him. But things go for a toss when the wrestlers arch-rival comes in and expects to be served by Sundar. A hapless Sundar is torn between the two angry fat men. And to add to the misery is our super mischievous Basha who is making sure that Sundar messes up everything with the wrestlers. The chain of events reach a point where the wrestlers start a kushti fight inside the hotel and BashamakES sure that Sundar becomes their punching bag. Will Sundars luck save him?!!!

programme.title: Smighty Claus
programme.desc: Sneevil dresses up like Smighty Claus to ruin Smighty Christmas. Can Melody and the rest of the Super Six stop him before he steals all the presents in Smightyland.

programme.title: DANCE DOJO
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to master dancing, much to Xia’s annoyance. April teaches Xia a move that he uses to defeat a Worm Monster and to earn his mondojitsu Brown Socks.

programme.title: Treasure Hunt
programme.desc: While dusting the house store room Dunky finds an old chest containing a treasure map. He is all thrilled. Keet and Cat also join in and are equally thrilled to find the treasure.

programme.title: Tooth Trouble
programme.desc: Zips got a bad toothache and is too afraid to go to the dentist. The Super Six decide to help by showing her how easy it is; however, their new dentist looks an awful lot like Sneevil who uses laughing gas to make the Smighties powerless. Zip has to face the dentist to rescue her friends.

programme.title: A Fishy Chase
programme.desc: Something is fishy in the air! Its Don’s new pet, a Goldfish. Charly Marly and Lary are drooling in hopes of feasting it, but not till Don is there to rescue it.

programme.title: Camping
programme.desc: Gummy and his pals all head off camping, with comedy and disaster joining them every step of the way!

programme.title: Frequent Flyer
programme.desc: Bags packed, Don and Colonel are all set to fly. Little do they know who are hiding amidst their ironed shirts. Charly Marly and Lary continue to steal food, messing things up for Don and Colonel. Even up in the air, the chaotic scene doesn’t change. To add on to this, guess who is on the next seat? Ballu!!!

programme.title: The Happy Prince
programme.desc: The south-bound Swallow sits on the Happy Prince statue. However, unlike its name the Prince statue is crying. The Swallow postpones his trip and decides to help the Prince.

programme.title: Kidnap Mayhem
programme.desc: One night a group of Bandits come to GrandPAs house to kidnap him. In a scheme of confusions the bandits manage the kidnap and arrive at a lonely warehouse on the outskirts of the town.

programme.title: Swimming Class
programme.desc: Dunky wants to learn swimming so goes to the lake with a tyre tube with Keet who is helping looking at the swimming manual to tell him how to swim.

programme.title: JOY RIDE
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to clean the Lord of the Wind. They can’t resist riding the annual Surf Winds, but Xia and April end up captured by the Wind Beast. Pai rescues them by repulsing the sensitive Wind Beast with his onion and sulfur-geyser stink.

programme.title: Magic Magic
programme.desc: Cat has to find new ways of catching Keet so as he sees the snake charmer on the street he gets a idea and quietly snatches away the flute of the charmer and runs back to the house to hypnotize Cat with it.

programme.title: Shrunken Jam
programme.desc: Don is baking a cake.In an apron.Puts the batter in a container the oven.Turns on the KNOB.And then... when he opens the oven door, the cake is missing. He cranes his neck and sees that there is a hole on the back of the oven! That is it, Charly Marly and Lary will pay for this!

programme.title: TRUNK CALL
programme.desc: Its a festival day and one of Chai Rajas customers has brought in a giant tusker who he parks outside the stall. But it is at the very same time that Sundar and Basha are steeped in a blind chase- a pan comes flying and knocks the customer out. As others carry him off for some first aid, Chai Raja entrusts the elephant in Sundars care. Sundar is intimidated by the animal has no choice but to accept. Inquisitive Basha meanwhile discovers that the tusker is in fact nothing but a gentle giant Basha strikes a plan to use Sundars fear of the animal to lay hands on extra banana-fries. As Sundarworks , he spots the tuskers trunk snake in and suck in banana fritters. He jumps to confront the animal but comes up nose against the pointed tusks. And so the fritters keep disappearing, until Sundar spots Basha hi-fiving the tusker. Furious, Sundar decides to teach the both of them a lesson and rigs a watery trap to drench Basha and the tusker, but the trap malfunctions and it all ends in the massive tusker, sliding behind first ramming into the stall and the tea shop board reads Hotel Cali Torn- Ia!

programme.title: Imaginary Friend
programme.desc: As Gummy starts spending more and more time with his imaginary friend, Harry and Kala soon start wondering if he’s nuts – or they are!

programme.title: Stone Soup
programme.desc: WI-Go the traveler is starving and has nothing but his brain. He ends up making the most delicious soup in the world using a mysterious stone without using a single penny.

programme.title: Froggy Friends
programme.desc: The frogs from the well are good friends of Keet so when ever Cat tries to enter the house to steal something from the kitchen they will croak and Keet.

programme.title: HYPNO-TACO
programme.desc: A new taco stand that has abruptly popped up overnight next to the tea shop. Strangely, though the tacos smell anything but tasty, the customers flock to it and Chai Raja sends Sundar to deal with matters. But that compounds the disaster as Sundar too turns his back at Chai Raja and starts guarding/waiting at the Taco stand with double his usual smartness! Though this gives Basha full freedom to raid the banana fries at the tea shop, Chai Rajas long face tugs at this heartstrings and Basha nips over to the taco stand to take a look at things. Thats when he realizes that the taco stand owner is in fact a rogue hypnotist from Bashas old circus who is literally hypnotizing the customers and Sundar to munch his Mexican lunch! Cracking his knuckles in glee, Basha sets about driving the rogue out of his mind and business. But a hypnotized Sunder is more powerful than ever, and Basha get whacked here and there in the ordeal. At last Basha gives a nice knock on Sundars head and he is back at the tea shop and Basha and Sundar together makes sure that the taco shop-owner runs for his dear life, much to Chai Rajas relief.

programme.title: Christmas Episode
programme.desc: Its Christmas time and Gummy Bear and all his pals are out to celebrate Christmas. They are going to have some serious fun along with some surprises!!

programme.title: Cruise Blues
programme.desc: On the deck of the cruise, Titanic-style Don and Colonel stand facing the sea, enjoying the breeze until the shark leaps up in the air. Where ever Don is, Charly Lary and Marly are sure to follow. Watch them battle sharks and take on the sea!

programme.title: Smorigins
programme.desc: The Super Six go back in time to find out the origins of the Smighty Stones. The Villains tag along, too and find themselves in the middle of a prehistoric dragon battle.

programme.title: Doobydoo Meep Concert
programme.desc: The annual Doobydoo Meep concert is about to take place, and Charlie wants to practice one last time before heading out. So Deedee chips in by agreeing to follow specific instructions to organise the difficult to manage Doobydoos but also promises not to use magic for anything at all. Deedee mixes up the sandwiches for the Doodyboos with the recorders that she ends up sending off with Mewmew. Nino constantly keeps Deedee in check so that she doesn’t back out of her promise. Mewmew is having a tough time organising with the Doobydoos while Deedee finds out Charlie has slept of practising. The concert goes well, but they all decide they won’t have lullabies ever again.

programme.title: Little Lost Dino
programme.desc: When Sneevil uses his newest contraption, the Dinocaller, he gets more than he hoped for. First, a small dinosaur who doesnt destroy the Smighties, but instead becomes Melodys pet, followed by his larger and angrier mommy and daddy dino.

programme.title: The Start of Me
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: FOREIGN DREAMS
programme.desc: A European couple visits the shop and they are thoroughly impressed by Chai Rajas cooking skills. They instantly give him a flight ticket to Europe to open a restaurant there. Chai Raja is already daydreaming about his wonderful hotel life in Europe. He puts a board in front of the shop HOTEL CLOSED, shuts down business and get ready to pack his things. Sundar and Basha are both shocked! Now they have to do everything in the world to make Chai Raja stay back. They try to bring back customers, try to mess up Chai Rjas preparation. Even the customers help the duo in stopping Chai Raja in a nice way. Basha is not happy with Sundars tricks and Sundar is not happy with Bashas. This inadvertently leads to a manic chase between the two. But Chai Raja screams to stop the duo. The next moment Chai Raja takes his baggage and is about to leave. When he sees the crowd of customers sadly waiting outside to bid him good bye. The wrestler even comes and hugs him crying. Sundar is sad. Basha is sad. Chai Raja cant take this. He tears the ticket into pieces, goes inside the hotel, turns on the radio..and STARTS MAKING TEA!!! Everything is back to normal including the duos chase.

programme.title: Eye Strain
programme.desc: The rat trio takes their plan one step ahead by fixing contact lens in Don’s eyes while he is asleep, thereby blurring his vision. Now the rats just partyyyyy and Don can’t see a thing. But when Colonel finds out the plan, the naughty rats are definitely in for a surprise.

programme.title: Fly Away Nino
programme.desc: Nino and Mewmew are making paper planes, but as Mewmew didn’t follow all the instructions Nino’s flies so well and much farther. And not just Nino, the twins too have fun seeing their planes fly so well. But no matter how much Mewmew tries it doesn’t fly like the planes of the others. Mewmew wishes her planes flew too so she asks Deedee to work some magic for her. So Deedee casts an ‘all day flying’ spell onto Mewmew’s plane but Nino comes in-between and gets hit by the spell on his helmet. Now Nino can’t stop flying and zooms away all over Abra-Dabra. He flies so wildly that he send Mayor De Pfeffle for a spin after knocking over his flower display. Nino is sorry for being so carried away that he tries to land, but to his surprise the helmet keeps pulling him skyward. Charlie tries weighing Nino down with his heavy mail bag, but the helmet is too strong for even Charlie to grab a hold of that Nino is flung away higher and farther. Nino promises to deliver the mail, much to the happiness of Charlie who can get a much deserved nap for all the effort. So begins Abra-Dabra’s very own first ‘air’-mail courtesy of Nino. Deedee comes up with a plan to help the ‘jet-lagged’ Nino after being inspired by the paper planes Mewmew makes. She shouts out to Nino to use a long sheet of paper from the mail bag and make a plane ‘Mewmew style’ with the wings pointing downwards. The plan works and Nino is able to fly right into Mewmew’s house and the magic wears-off as the sun sets in Abra-Dabra. In all the fuss Mewmew understands what made her planes not to fly, which actually helped Nino come down, and makes her paper planes fly so well now, thanks to Deedee.

programme.title: GLOVE OF THE SOUTH
programme.desc: Negu is thrilled to learn there is a Glove of the South hidden on the Guardians’ island. He sends a big-eyed mutant, The Finder, to find the glove and bring it to him. The Guardians try to stop The Finder, but fail. Luckily, when Negu dons the Glove of the South, it tickles him mercilessly! The Glove of the South was a trick, invented by the Elders!

programme.title: Marco's Garden
programme.desc: The neighboring dog Moti is very fussy about his Garden of the house and takes his job seriously to guard it.

programme.title: Spooktacular.
programme.desc: The gang is ‘haunted’ by a mystery spook – and sets out to overcome their collective fear and get to the bottom of the scary mystery.

programme.title: Ant Attack!
programme.desc: It is a usual day in the house with the war between the dogs and the rats. And there is a new group. In fact an army of enemies – ants! And they make the life in the house a living hell. For the first time Don , Colonel and the rat trio get a real taste of the bad ants.

programme.title: A4 Paper
programme.desc: Blank paper? No problem, Hepi and Briko are full of ideas

programme.title: Super Gummy
programme.desc: Accidentally convinced that he’s a super hero, Gummy becomes Mind-O-Man – and sets out to help out everybody... to the point of driving them CRAZY!

programme.title: Take A Dance On Me
programme.desc: Pancake is terrible dancer, and when he joins the Zoonicorns in their dances to make flowers bloom, his issues could disrupt springtime. You dont have to be perfect at something to enjoy it.Feelings are as important as skills.

programme.title: Much to Your Surprise
programme.desc: When Maple ruins a surprise meant for Pancake, she finds out in the Zooniverse that surprises are only surprising when they are surprises. Seeing things from other people’s points of view can make things easier to understand.

programme.title: A Whole New Ballgame
programme.desc: The Moon in the Zooniverse has fallen from the sky and Odessa and the Zoonicorns must get it back to where it belongs. Sharing can be fun. Never give up.

programme.title: Disapprearing Act
programme.desc: In the waking world, Odessa gets embarrassed, which makes her invisible in the Zooniverse. With the humorous help of the Zoonicorns she gains understanding and perspective – and becomes visible again! When you make the effort to understand your feelings, you can manage them and move forward from them in a positive way.

programme.title: A Star Is Jumped
programme.desc: Odessa learns to leap over stars by starting on low ones,Persistence pays off, especially when you learn from each step along the way, building up to the final goal.

programme.title: Charlie’s Castle
programme.desc: It’s Uncle Charlie’s birthday and the twins have surprised him with a nap mask and breakfast, but the twins want to celebrate a little more by throwing a party and inviting all their friends. Although Charlie wishes to have a more peaceful celebration, he gives in to the pleas of Boris and Sandy. After getting a hint from Charlie on how much he loves chess, boris and sandy plan the birthday party around a ‘knights and castles’ theme. The twins get Deedee to bring balloons, a castle cake with turrets from Tiggy and a jousting dance from Mewmew. Boris and Sandy set out to decorate Uncle Charlie’s house, just in time for their friends coming in with all the goodies for the party. They even invent a balloon jousting game between Deedee and Mewmew that makes Mewmew crash into Tiggy’s cake and thereby wreck all the arrangements much to the dismay of the twins. This calls for Deedee’s magic where all the party ingredients are put into a large purple cauldron and it makes a gigantic bouncing castle in the chequerboard garden. And the snoring sounds lead them to find Uncle Charlie napping right inside it. They bounce around Uncle Charlie as much as they can and then wind down for a long snooze. Uncle Charlie awakes to happily find that the twins have organised his most best birthday slumber party ever.

programme.title: Heungboo and Nolboo
programme.desc: Mischievous UGo takes all of his parents property and kicks his younger brother GoGo out of the house. Meanwhile, a swallow bird brings a gourd seed to the eaves of a kind-hearted GoGo house, and soon, gourds containing gold and silver treasures opens on the roof of the GoGos house.

programme.title: A Cold Crunch
programme.desc: It is freezing cold. Don is wrapped in a blanket when he notices a glow from the mouse’s hole. Wearing sunglasses and shorts, They have an orange coil burning right in the centre and its toasty and warm in there. Don has found a solution, he picks up the phone and orders for an electric blanket!

programme.title: The Tortoise and the Hare
programme.desc: The Hare, the fastest animal in the woods, and the tortoise, the slowest, compete in a race.

programme.title: SMART YOGURT
programme.desc: Niya unwittingly falls for Durian Grey’s latest ploy; Dojo infiltrating yoghurt chumplings.

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: Speed decides its time for an all out assault on the Shadowy Organization. They manage to get the part back, but in the process Speed Sr. is captured. The kids have to save dad and eventually do, but they discover that Speed and Xs mom is Trixie, leader of the Shadowy org

programme.title: Holiday Resort
programme.desc: Don and colonel are about to start their wonderful holiday in an elite resort. Instead, they don’t even spend a single peaceful second in the place. Thanks to the mad rats! At last when the dogs leave the resort, they plan a nasty trap for the rats. But the rats are too smarttt…..

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: Gummy, Harry and Kala head off to a scary Halloween costume party – but the winner of the ‘Best Costume’ prize.... isn’t wearing a costume, and is actually a real monster!

programme.title: Much ado about poo
programme.desc: YOYO visit a park for dogs that is ruined by pooches fouling on the grass which their owners cant be bothered to clear up

programme.title: Mewmew And The Beanstalk
programme.desc: Mewmew is setting up his garden in such a way to get a Gardening Star from Mayor De Pfeffle. Usually Tiggy wins them every year and he’s optimistic to win it this year as well. As Tiggy says the secret lies in the beans, Mewmew rushes off to freshly plant exactly that from just seeds. But Mewmew is impatient to wait till next year which calls for Deedee’s magic. Deedee puts a spell of ‘grow faster’ on the beans making them sprout soon enough. The next morning Mayor De Pfeffle polishes the Gardening Star to a shining bright sparkle, then sets off to inspect. Deedee and Nino find Mewmew trapped in her house strangled tight by huge beanstalks. The only way to pry her free would be to pluck all the beans off the stalks thanks to Tiggy’s suggestion on what to do. But though Mewmew didn’t have much of a garden, hew friends were able to put up a fabulous rock garden that got Mewmew a special recognition star from Mayor De Pfeffle. Just then Tiggy comes along with his special bean soup, much to the delight of everyone, except Mewmew who is a bit overloaded with seeing so many beans that day.

programme.title: Robo-Gummy
programme.desc: Finding himself over-committed to too many things, Gummy orders a few duplicate robots of himself... who winds up in the end causing more trouble than they’re worth!

programme.title: TREE TROUBLE
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to help with heavy gardening, much to Xia’s dismay. Negu sends a Giant Beaver Mutant to eat the Yan’s world trees, threatening its very survival. Pai has to master cooking Slippery Jade Noodles to get the Mutant to eat something besides trees.

programme.title: Panda-Monium
programme.desc: Maestro Woof needs the kind of bamboo that the Purple Panda eats so he can make a new flute, and he sends the Guardians to find some. Xia criticizes April’s skills as a pilot, so she decides to take the Lord of the Wind on a practice run while her friends look for the bamboo. When Xia and Pai are captured by a Mutant Purple Panda, April gets to show off her piloting prowess as she rescues them, and at the same time gathers the bamboo they need.

programme.title: Moon Charmer
programme.desc: Samir the local snake charmer is trying unsuccessfully to charm a snake out of his basket and the market is growing restless until Jamillah arrives and all of the market is in awe! When she explains where she comes from Samir is thrilled and asks her to accompany him to see a rare astrological site, a blood moon. But its a sight best seen from above and the greatest viewing spots are outside the city gates which are locked at night not to mention the law expressly forbidding anyone to leave. When they try to leave via a secret door a guard catches them, but just when all hope seems lost Jamillah has an idea - the magic carpet! And with that they take off into a night sky filled with a big red moon.

programme.title: The Controllator
programme.desc: Everyone has forgotten April’s birthday, so when a stranger gives her a present, she’s delighted to accept it. It’s one of Negu’s inventions, which makes her do things against her will. When April, controlled by Negu, manages to steal the Glove of the North, Pai and Xia prove that they had remembered her birthday really, and get April to remove the device that’s control her.

programme.title: Snow Trip
programme.desc: On a school ski trip, Fred tries to impress Nora by riding Friday transformed into a trick snow board. Still, he’s no match for the naturally-talented Eddie, who ends up selflessly rescuing Fred from a snow drift. The one who really ends up impressing Nora, is Brains.

programme.title: 52 The Zoonigames
programme.desc: Pancake is disheartened when Odessa beats him at a game, but after playing a series of games in the Zooniverse, he learns there’s something even more important than winning-or-losing. Playing games is not about winning or losing but bout having fun!

programme.title: Show Time
programme.desc: We start the show with a close up of the remote the camera pulls out to see Keet picking the remote and starts watching the last episode of “ Bigger boss” a reality show on TV.

programme.title: Fish Soup
programme.desc: Aladdin waits at the back of the line to buy fish to make fish soup for his mum. When Jamillah arrives wearing a fancy salwar kameeze Aladdin thinks she looks like a princess. Jamillah takes on the role and soon the queue is moving aside to let the great Princess to the front. Things start to go wrong when the fishmonger insists on giving Jamillah the biggest fish on his stall and Aladdin cant carry it home. He drops it in the dirt and Mustafa almost uncovers Jamillahs disguise but luckily Genie arrives just in time to save them.

programme.title: Tidy Up Time
programme.desc: Deedee almost falls on her bottom, if not for Nino’s timely save, by tripping on a big red ball in her courtyard. It looks like the twins are having a playing spree but are not careful in keeping things back where they belong. Charlie can’t stand the mess any more that he posts Sandy and Boris with the chore of tidying up the entire place before he gets back from his postman duties that day. Charlie furthers the chore by cautioning them that any toys that are not kept back in their rightful places will be given away, to which the twins sadly agree. But more than tidying, the twins set out messing up what Deedee and Nino are patiently helping them with. The twins neither want Uncle Charlie to give away any of their toys nor are they able to clean it up soon enough. It seems only Deedee’s magic can help them, much to the dismay of Nino. Not only do all the toys magically shut themselves in the toy chest, all of them are nowhere to be seen when Sandy peeps in. The spell seems to have been too strong that it made the toys clear away from the home of the twins and fall in different places all over Abra-Dabra, in Tiggy’s cooking pot, inside Mayor De Pfeffle’s shoe, in Mewmew’s garden, in the front yard of the Doobydoos, and everywhere else. They all set out to get the toys back for the twins but the toy zebra and the toy frog are nowhere to be seen. Finally they find them with the Doobydoos who think the toys belong to them. So Boris and Sandy decide to give them other toys in exchange for Dr Frog and Zuzu. Uncle Charlie returns to see the twins happily play with their most favourite toys and appreciates them for making the home sparkling clean.

programme.title: The Palace Garden
programme.desc: Jamillah lands inside a beautiful garden, she encourages Aladdin to come and join her but he warns her to get out, they are the Palace Gardens and shell be locked away if shes found in them! But Jamillah has no way out so Aladdin decides to try and rescue her. He rushes home to Genie but Genie doesnt hear in time so he tries to find a ladder on his own to hop over the fence and save Jamillah. Genie catches up with him just as he gets to the palace walls and realizes that the ladder isnt big enough, so he makes it longer. They climb into the palace only to find Jamillah happy and smiling playing games with the Princess. Soon they are all playing and having fun

programme.title: Poder De La flor
programme.desc: The Super Six go back in time to find out the origins of the Smighty Stones. The Villains tag along, too and find themselves in the middle of a prehistoric dragon battle.

programme.title: Disapprearing Act
programme.desc: In the waking world, Odessa gets embarrassed, which makes her invisible in the Zooniverse. With the humorous help of the Zoonicorns she gains understanding and perspective – and becomes visible again! When you make the effort to understand your feelings, you can manage them and move forward from them in a positive way.

programme.title: Coco Jumbo
programme.desc: It’s the time of the month when the coconuts from the trees have to be removed to be send the market for sale. GrandPA has entrusted Dunky to do this job.

programme.title: The Magic Wand
programme.desc: The van of the magician is passing by the GrandPAs house as Hoodie grabs the magicians wand unnoticed and heads towards the house.

programme.title: Iris Gone Wild
programme.desc: When Maple is jealous of everything Pancake gets to do because hes older, she sees a chance to be the oldest in the Zooniverse and grabs it. But being oldest isnt as simple as she thinks it will be. Understanding that you have different abilities and responsibilities at every age./Respecting your limits

programme.title: Kitten up a Tree
programme.desc: When Gummy comes upon a kitten stuck up a tree, he and the gang become increasingly caught up in trying figure out ways to get it back down.

programme.title: I Need A Cleaning Fairy
programme.desc: Scot invents a new machine called the Cleaning Fairy. Its an amazing invention that cleans everything by itself, but it does have a slight crease. It doesnt know when to stop and is so powerful that it can fly objects as large as a camping car. Meanwhile, Dada entrusts Pinkar to Caber when he goes out to look for deer. But Duda appears with a ball and Pinkar becomes a mess of mud. Duda discovers Scots Cleaning Fairy and puts him to work. Everything seems to be going well until the invention takes off and takes Pinkar to heaven. Duda, Caber and Scot chase after him, and to their horror they notice that the Cleaning Fairy is slowly losing her power, meaning that Pinkar could end up crashing to the ground. Just then, Dada shows up and doesnt look happy...

programme.title: The Green Monkey - The Thousand And One Nights
programme.desc: The fairytale detective SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the exotic world of The Thousand and One Nights, having been called out by the VIZIER of Baghdad. His daughter, SCHEHERAZADE has mysteriously lost her voice, when there is just one more night to go to reach the magic number 1001. If SANDRA and FO don’t manage to solve the case and remedy the problem, SCHEHERAZADE will not be able to tell the last story to the SULTAN and will be executed the next morning

programme.title: Misadventure
programme.desc: The painter inside Don has woken and he must have his painting on the wall. But the rats are ready even to turn the world upside down to stop Don from fulfilling his dream. And you can imagine what will follow. But whatever happens in between, it is all a sweet happy ending.

programme.title: Merry Go Bush
programme.desc: Pancake isn’t taking care of his new pet fish appropriately, even though he’s trying super-hard. When he arrives in the Zoonivese and tries to help Ene take care of a Merry-Go-Bush, he learns to that there’s a right way, and a wrong way, to care for something (by following the rules), no matter the good intentions

programme.title: BABY POX
programme.desc: Everyone but Pai catches a pox that makes you act like a baby. He has to sail the Lord of the Wind by himself to get a mushroom for the cure, all while caring for the “babies.” Negu sends a huge Mutant Toad. Luckily, the toad catches the Baby Pox, too!

programme.title: Down With Flu
programme.desc: Don is down with flu and his sneezes have left the mice sleepless. They take it as their sole responsibility to stop Don’s sneezes by hook or crook! From medicinal ginger tea to ringing up the doctor they try it all to stop the flu.

programme.title: Paint It Back
programme.desc: Odessa gets angry when her chalk drawing is ruined by a rainstorm. In the Zooniverse, she discovers that all the color has drained away, and she and the Zoonicorns must "paint" the hues back. In the process, she discovers methods to manage her anger and frustration. How to manage anger and frustration in a positive manner.

programme.title: Giant Love – Little Brave Tailor
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant, the elf FO, travel into the story of the Brave Little Tailor by the Brothers Grimm, having been called out by the KING in that story. Some time ago, the TAILOR set out to finish off the two GIANTS that are terrorising the kingdom, and he has still not come back. SANDRA and FO go to the GIANTS’ lair and discover that the LITTLE TAILOR has been taken prisoner by them. So far, the LITTLE TAILOR has managed to save his skin by offering to make two enormous suits for his captors. But the day these suits are finished, they will devour him. SANDRA and FO manage to rescue the LITTLE TAILOR, promising the GIANTS the thing they most want: a girlfriend each, two charming giantesses, to keep them company.

programme.desc: Un músico clásico y un rockero rivales comparten la casa. Cuando aparece la hija de uno, el otro se enamora.

programme.title: 20 Days

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: SEHMAT
programme.desc: The story centers around a young woman named Sehmat, who is eagerly anticipating her Muklawa, a traditional Punjabi custom that marks the first meeting between a newlywed couple. Sehmat has been in love with her husband Joginder since they were married as children, and she is excited to finally be reunited with him. However, on the day of their Muklawa, Joginder, who is an army man, is called away to fight in a war. The film then follows the emotional journey of Sehmat and Joginder as they navigate the difficulties of their separation and the choices they must make in the face of war. Joginder is torn between his love for Sehmat and his duty to his country, ultimately choosing to put his country first. This decision leaves Sehmat feeling both sad and proud, as she realizes the sacrifice that Joginder has made for his country. Overall, the film appears to explore themes of love, sacrifice, and patriotism, set against the backdrop of a tumultuous and uncertain time in history.

programme.title: The Candid Candidate- 1937
programme.desc: Betty Boop campaigns for Grampy for Mayor; he wins by one vote, but finds politics is no picnic. Urban renewal is parodied.

programme.title: Now Hear This 1962
programme.desc: In this very abstract cartoon, a hard-of-hearing old Britisher finds a red horn and uses it as a megaphone, unaware that it is really a lost horn from the Devil's forehead. The Britisher finds that the horn has the effect of amplifying every sound psychedelically and causing him serious bodily harm

programme.title: Educated Fish-1937
programme.desc: A rebellious fish refuses to listen to his teacher until he ventures out into the real world and discovers the importance of education.

programme.title: Fresh Airedale 1945
programme.desc: In his master's eyes, "good old Shep" is the perfect dog, but the cat knows he's really a two-faced mutt who can be bought off with a bone by a burglar, and then take credit for it when the cat chases the crook off. But then Shep becomes obsessed by a newspaper story proclaiming a real canine hero the nation's "No. 1 Dog."

programme.title: Rookie Revue 1941
programme.desc: The toons do a send up of the military as only the toons can do

programme.title: Often an Orphan 1949
programme.desc: Charlie Dog tries everything to get Porky to take him in and he finally does. After a couple pranks the dog pound ends up picking up Porky and not the dog.

programme.title: Betty Boop- Whoops! I'm a Cowboy-1937
programme.desc: Betty Boop's runt of a suitor thinks he'll have better luck if he takes cowboy lessons at a dude ranch; slapstick results.

programme.title: Betty Boop with Henry the Funniest Living American-1935
programme.desc: Henry, comic strip character, gets a job at Betty Boop's pet store

programme.title: Cad and Caddy- 1947
programme.desc: Lulu plans her revenge against a distressed golfer who refuses to give her a lollipop after he promised her one for caddieing for him

programme.title: Tulips Shall Grow 1942 (madcap models no. u1-5)
programme.desc: A carefree boy and a young girl find their idyllic countryside invaded by an army of mindlessly destructive robots.

programme.title: The Return of Mr. Hook -1945
programme.desc: Seaman Hook has big plans for after the war, mostly involving rushing home and marrying his sweetie. So do his fellow seaman, but theirs involve buying bond

programme.title: Secret Agent 1943
programme.desc: Superman battles saboteurs determined to stop a lady double agent from getting important documents to Washington D.C.

programme.title: Plane Dumb-1932
programme.desc: After crash landing in Africa, Tom and Jerry masquerade as Africans in a futile attempt to adapt to a strange environment.

programme.title: The Star of Bethlehem956
programme.desc: A nativity story animated with music performed by the Glyndeboume Festival Chorus.

programme.title: Fireman's Life, A-1933
programme.desc: Fireman's Life

programme.title: The Booze Hangs High-1930
programme.desc: Bosko has a grand time on the farm, dancing with a cow, playing a horse's tail like a violin and getting drunk with three pigs

programme.title: The Trojan Horse 1960
programme.desc: During the Trojan War, the Greeks build a giant wooden horse as a stratagem to conquer the city of Troy. Adapted from the Greek myth.

programme.title: Popeye the Sailor Meets Ali Baba's Forty Thieves 1937
programme.desc: Popeye the Sailor, accompanied by Olive Oyl and Wimpy, is dispatched to stop the dreaded bandit Abu Hassan and his force of forty thieves.

programme.title: Felix in Fairyland-1923
programme.desc: Felix is reading a book about Fairyland, and decides that it must be a wonderful place to be. Suddenly he hears a cry for help, and finds a fly stuck on a piece of flypaper. He rescues the insect, only to have it turn into a beautiful fairy princess who, in gratitude for his help, grants him one wish. He wishes he were in Fairyland, and is immediately transported there.

programme.title: Superman: Eleventh Hour- 1942
programme.desc: While Clark Kent is in wartime Japan, Superman becomes a saboteur.

programme.title: Betty Boop Is My Palm Read -1932
programme.desc: For customer Betty Boop, psychic reader Prof. Bimbo conjures up an adventure on a haunted tropical island in his crystal ball

programme.title: Betty Boop- More Pep- 1936
programme.desc: In a return to the 'Out of the Inkwell' format, Betty Boop invents a 'pep' formula to speed up lazy Pudgy, but it escapes into the 'real world' with rapid results.

programme.title: Aladdin(Mel-O-Toons) 1960
programme.desc: In this adaptation of the Arabian Nights tale, poor Aladdin discovers a magic lamp containing a genie who grants his wish to marry a princess.

programme.title: Space Transformer 1985
programme.desc: Using new technology, a crew consisting of Captain Chi, Nancy, and the robots Baipam and Diatron 5, is shrunken to microscopic size and injected into Ivy's body in order to defeat the invaders. Enlisting benevolent beings found inside Ivy's body, the crew prepares for an inner space battle that can decide the fate of the world.

programme.title: Young Sherlocks-1922
programme.desc: The Mystic J.J.J.'s challenge Ernie's bravery; he spins a tale of saving a rich young girl from kidnappers and of creating a utopia called Freetown.

programme.title: The Boat by Buster Keaton 1921
programme.desc: Buster and his family go on a voyage on his homemade boat that proves to be one disaster after another

programme.title: Laurel & Hardy Home
programme.desc: Laurel & Hardy Home Films

programme.title: The Rink by Charlie Chaplin 1916
programme.desc: After causing restaurant chaos at work, a bumbling waiter tears up the local roller rink with his skating.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show 1963: Season 3; Episode 28; The Rival
programme.desc: When Opie's efforts fail to attract classmate Karen's personal interest, Thelma Lou steps in to boost Opie's confidence but destroys Barney's along the way. Can Andy realign this skewed love quadrangle?

programme.title: Bliss- 1917
programme.desc: A counterfeit count is aided in his courtship of the heroine by her father who is overwhelmed by his 'title.'

programme.title: Adventures of Ozzie & Harriet 1952: Season 1;Episode 5; Halloween Party
programme.desc: On Halloween night, Ozzie and Thorny make plans to attend a non-costume party as Satan and a Scotsman. Meanwhile Ricky and David attend a Halloween Party at school and the Nelson household is besieged by children demanding candy - or else.

programme.title: Disorder in the Court 1936
programme.desc: The stooges are witnesses at a trial where their friend, a dancer at a nightclub where they are musicians, is accused of murder. The stooges manage to disrupt the proceedings but save the day when they discover the real murderer's identity.

programme.title: Smart Alecks-1942
programme.desc: Danny comes into money for capturing an elusive criminal - money which Mugs insists he split equally with the gang while gangsters want to split open Danny.

programme.title: You are watching the latest sports news from around the world!
Game previews, highlights and interviews from your favorite sport!
See what happened in the world of sports while you were sleeping!
The latest sports that you may have missed!
Stories of the Century S1E6 Cattle Kate
programme.desc: Matt and Frankie head to Sweetwater, Wyoming where major cattle ranches are suffering heavy losses. A woman nicknamed Cattle Kate becomes the focus due the number of livestock she sells despite her small operation. A grim fate awaits her and her associate

programme.title: Outlaws of the Range
programme.desc: When Steve Harper chases down some rustlers, he loses his gun in the ensuing fistfight. After Wilson is killed, Steve's gun is found nearby and he as arrested. Jimmy Wilson breaks him out of jail and he heads after the real killer

programme.title: Stories of the Century S1E4 Geronimo
programme.desc: Railroad detectives Matt Clark (Jim Davis) and Frankie Adams (Mary Castle), go after Apache chief Geronimo (Chief Yowlachie), who has been identified by Joe Burns (Emile Meyer), the night watchman of the railroad yards, as the leader of a band of freight-car robbers

programme.title: Stories of the Century S1E2 Billy the Kid
programme.desc: In the second entry of this Emmy-award winning series, all filled with archive footage from Republic Pictures theatrical features, railroad detective Matt Clark (Jim Davis), and his assistant Frankie Adams (Mary Castle), set out on the trail of a gang of cattle rustlers led by one of the West's youngest and most notorious outlaws, Billy Bonney (Richard Jaeckel), aka Billy the Kid

programme.title: Range Warfare 1935
programme.desc: Marshal Reb Russell (Reb Russell), working for the Cattleman's Pretectice Association, is sent into a territory to investigate a large-scale rustling operation carried out by a well organized gang of outlaws. He is ambushed outside of town by Jerry Blake (Gene Alsace), a man he once sent to prison, and kills him in the ensuing gunfight. Red finds a note on Blake that introduces him to man called Deke. The gunfight is witnessed by Tommy Lord (Hal Taliaferro) and his girlfriend, Sue Callahan ('Lucille Lund), whose father, Wade Callahan (Lafe McKee),has been a victim of the rustlers. Sue rides for the sheriff, Curt Turner (Slim Whitaker). It turns out that the sheriff and his ten-man posse comprise most of the members of the rustling gang and have no intentions of allowing Reb to leave the area with his life intact

programme.title: Stories. of the Century S2E12 Jack Slade
programme.desc: Railroad $25,000 payroll is stolen. Matt and Margaret investigate

programme.title: The Night Before Christmas 1968
programme.desc: In The Night Before Christmas, the timeless holiday poem springs to life in a colorful animated retelling. As children nestle in their beds on Christmas Eve, Saint Nicholas arrives with his sleigh full of toys, spreading joy and wonder with every step. With warm narration, festive music, and charming animation, this family favorite captures the magic and spirit of Clement Clarke Moore’s classic tale, making it a cherished Christmas tradition on screen.

programme.title: The Shanty Where Santy Claus Lives 1933
programme.desc: In The Shanty Where Santy Claus Lives, a heartwarming Merrie Melodies cartoon, a lonely boy is taken in by Santa on Christmas Eve and whisked away to a magical shanty filled with toys, music, and holiday cheer. As the night unfolds, the child discovers the joy of belonging and the true spirit of Christmas. With lively animation, whimsical gags, and a touching message, this Depression-era short captures both the hardship and hope of the season.

programme.title: Don't Open Til Christmas 1984
programme.desc: In Don’t Open Till Christmas, holiday cheer turns to terror on the streets of London when a masked killer begins targeting anyone dressed as Santa Claus. As the bodies pile up, a determined detective races against time to unmask the murderer before Christmas Eve becomes a nightmare. With grisly twists, chilling suspense, and a sinister holiday atmosphere, this cult slasher proves that not every gift under the tree brings joy.

programme.title: The Adventures of Robin Hood: The Christmas Goose 1957
programme.desc: In The Adventures of Robin Hood: The Christmas Goose, Richard Greene dons the green cloak once more in this holiday-themed tale of merriment and mischief. When greedy lords try to tax the people of Sherwood into hunger during the Christmas season, Robin Hood and his Merry Men hatch a clever plan involving a prize goose to bring cheer back to the poor. With daring adventure, festive spirit, and a touch of Yuletide humor, this family-friendly special blends classic Robin Hood heroics with holiday warmth.

programme.title: Scrooge 1932
programme.desc: In Scrooge, Seymour Hicks brings Charles Dickens’ immortal Ebenezer Scrooge to life in one of the earliest sound versions of A Christmas Carol. On a cold Christmas Eve, the miserly Scrooge is visited by the ghost of his late partner, Jacob Marley, and three spirits who reveal the shadows of his past, present, and future. Faced with his own greed and the suffering it causes, Scrooge must choose between a lonely grave and redemption. Atmospheric and faithful to Dickens’ classic tale, this 1932 adaptation delivers timeless holiday magic and a powerful message of compassion.

programme.desc: In Rock River Renegades, the Range Busters roar back into action! When a dangerous gang stirs up trouble along Rock River, Crash Corrigan, Dusty King, and Alibi Terhune saddle up to bring law and order to the frontier. With fast-paced gunfights, daring stunts, and Alibi’s trademark humor, this action-packed Western delivers all the thrills fans of the series love.

programme.title: Behind the Blend
programme.desc: Sean sits down with Lynn Hawkins of Placencia Cigars, one of the most respected names in the industry. Lynn pulls back the curtain on Placencia's extensive history as a leading grower and producer, sharing insights into their meticulous tobacco cultivation, the intricate art of their cigar manufacturing process, and what makes their family's legacy truly stand out in the world of premium cigars.

programme.title: Behind the Blend
programme.desc: In this episode of Behind the Blend, Sean speaks with Jose Blanco from La Galera Cigars, a company with five generations of family history in tobacco farming and cigar manufacturing in the Dominican Republic. Jose discusses the company's core cigar lines, including the Connecticut, Habano, and San Andres Maduro, explaining how they are blended for full flavor rather than just strength and that the company's Connecticut blend helped them get on the map by challenging the notion that Connecticut wrappers lacked flavor. He also shares his vision for the company, focusing on promoting the humble and welcoming culture of cigar smoking, and talks about the challenge and reward of working alongside his father to carry on the family legacy.

programme.title: Unrolled
programme.desc: Join Dominic Depinto on a tour of Grand Cathedral Cigar Lounge in Tampa Florida. Learn the history and check out their walk in humidor, only on Unrolled.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: Brian and Chris, your trusted tobacco experts, tackle the unique Drew Estate Year of the Rat cigar. They'll dissect its distinctive blend, construction, and flavor nuances, offering their seasoned perspectives on this celebrated release. Tune in to see if this Year of the Rat lives up to the hype and earns their stamp of approval.

programme.title: Texas Cigar Roadshow
programme.desc: In this episode, Dave Yancey and Ash Red return for more pairings, bringing Leaf and Grain coffee, an Australian red wine, and Jack Daniels Single Barrel. I‚Äôm smoking a Tobacco Cabana House Criollo '99, Ian has the House stick Habano, while Ash Red and Dave enjoy a Karen Berger Connecticut. A fantastic new pairing experience all around!

programme.title: Texas Cigar Roadshow
programme.desc: In this episode of Texas Cigar Roadshow, Dave Yancey joins me to review Matthew McConaughey‚Äôs new Pantalones Anejo tequila, paired with the Tabaquero by Hamlet Paredes. This cigar features a Mexican San Andres wrapper, binder, and fillers from Nicaragua and Brazil, making for a rich and flavorful experience.

programme.title: The Burn Down Podcast
programme.desc: The Blueprint Cigar by The Burn Down Podcast earns an impressive 91 rating, making it the highest-rated among its peers. Find out what makes this cigar stand out in the world of premium cigars!

programme.title: Creekside Cigar Co.
programme.desc: This Creekside Cigar Co podcast episode answers viewer questions and debunks cigar myths, such as the white ash signifying quality and the legend of cigars being rolled on virgins' thighs.

In Chicas Guapas, the audience can become a protagonist by voting weekly their favorite makeup and hair tutorials, contesting for tickets to exclusive events, meeting emerging designers & celebrities and exploring the trends of each season from the hand of our #EmbajadorasChicasGuapas . programme.desc: Chicas Guapas is the first TV and online community of fashion, beauty and lifestyle with #EmbajadorasChicasGuapas. They are Latin American influencers in Argentina, Uruguay, Chile, Mexico, Colombia, Ecuador, Peru, Paraguay, Costa Rica, Venezuela and the UK. In Chicas Guapas, the audience can become a protagonist by voting weekly their favorite makeup and hair tutorials, contesting for tickets to exclusive events, meeting emerging designers & celebrities and exploring the trends of each season from the hand of our #EmbajadorasChicasGuapas . Chicas Guapas has more than 97 million monthly impressions. It was created and is directed by Lucía Ugarte, from Buenos Aires, Argentina.

programme.title: Argentina Fashion Week: Luxury Trends + Antigüedades + Ganadora CG Foundation | PROGRAMA COMPLETO
programme.desc:
Programa completo de #ChicasGuapasTV:
- Apertura de #argentinafashionweek con #luxurytrends : hablamos con Vero de la Canal, Jorge Rey, Mario Vidal, Nuria Bueno y Marcelo Senra. -Visitamos Daniel Miranda Antiques, una tienda con antigüedades de lujo que transcienden en el tiempo y elevan tus espacios. - Hablamos con la ganadora del Latina Seed Awards '23, el premio de #ChicasGuapasFoundation.

programme.title: Pampita por Swarovski + New York Fashion Week + Educación en medicina estética | PROGRAMA COMPLETO
programme.desc:
Programa completo de #ChicasGuapasTV
- Cobertura del #newyorkfashionweek: Entrevista al diseñador argentino Panni Margot, el homenaje a #AgathaRuizDeLaPrada, experiencia TresEmmé y todo el backstage exclusivo. - Hablamos con Pampita en el relanzamiento de #Swarovski en Argentina. - Hablamos con Teresa Ortega y Mariano Retamal sobre la nueva plataforma educativa de medicina estética de @MedexxHighTechnology.

programme.title: LAFS 2024 Miami con Stef Roitman + Reducir la celulitis + Decoración de interior | PROGRAMA COMPLETO
programme.desc:
Programa completo de #ChicasGuapasTV del 16/11/24:
- Cobertura del @latinamericanfashionsummit: Lucía Ugarte entrevistó a #StefRoitman, #calleypoche, a Samantha (co-fundadora de #LAFS) y además, "La Torres" nos cuenta cómo va el desarollo de su negocio luego de haber ganado el premio de #ChicasGuapasFoundation. - Fuimos al lanzamiento oficial de #Alidya en Argentina y conocemos todos los detalles de su nuevo producto para la prevención y reducción de la #celulitis - En un nuevo episodio de #YoJefa, conocemos la historia de Lorena Sauer, quién emigró de Argentina en los años 2000 y hoy vive en #Miami triunfando con la #decoraciondeinteriores.

programme.title: Fashion Styling con CAMI HOMS + Desfile JORGE REY + Colonia UY + Vitamin Shock | PROGRAMA COMPLETO
programme.desc:
Programa completo de #ChicasGuapasTV del 26/10/24
- Fashion Styling de #CamiHoms x Flor Baragiani. - Cobertura exclusiva del desfile de Jorge Rey: Hablamos con grandes figuras como #CrisMorena, Fabián Medina Flores, #IsabelMacedo, Mora Furtado, Fabiana Araujo, #CandeCopello ¡y muchos más! - Evento "Colonia en Buenos Aires": hablamos con Pepe Cibrián, Martín de Freitas (Director de Turismo de Colonia) y Belén Francese. - Lanzamiento de Vitamin Shock por CAV: Mario Guevara, su fundador, nos cuenta todo sobre esta línea completamente innovadora para #saludcapilar.

programme.title: Dr. Charles Stanley
programme.desc: A Cry For Comfort - Dr. Stanley tells us God always has a reason for our trials, and we’ll never have to go through them alone if we’ve trusted Jesus Christ as our Savior.

programme.title: Ed Young Ministries
programme.desc: When you're asleep, you don't know you're sleeping until you're awake — since we spend 1/3 of our lives sleeping, we have a lot of waking up to do! In this message, Pastor Ed Young teaches that ideas have consequences — deceptive or dire ideas have destructive effects. We learn that Wokeism is a bad idea, and we must wake up to its aftermath, which originates with the enemy himself. And we’ll discover that life fires on all cylinders when we wake up to knowing the Lord. Are you woke yet still in slumber, or genuinely awake?
